title: SC Forged Alliance Beta workaround
description:
With this you&#039;ll be able to play FA Beta in singleplayer(sandbox).
Just extract the file to the FA setup folder and run extract.bat, then you&#039;ll have to create a shortuct for /bin/SupremeCommander.exe and launch the game with "/map <mapname> /faction <factionnumber> " to play.
AI is not possible in the beta, and I couldn&#039;t get LAN to work either.
